text: @toryboypierce @BricktopWilbury @COVID19 @MattHancock Its no big deal. Only the media, and the loony left, gives a flying  f**k. It was an aggressive target; a challenge designed to focus effort. So let the journalists  rant on; they have become an irrelevance and matter not at all.
